## Contributing

> [!TIP]
> **Want to contribute to this division?** Each project has its own contribution guidelines.

**General process:**

1. **Choose a project** from the [Projects](#projects) section above
2. **Read project README** and contribution guidelines
3. **Follow company standards** ([CWS-STD-001]([link]), [CWS-STD-002]([link]), [CWS-STD-003]([link]))
4. **Apply Kingdom Technology principles** - Excellence, service, eternal value

**Questions?** See [CONTRIBUTING.md]([link]) or contact [maintainers].
